note.p: Daughter of Captain John Lidderdale, second son of William Robertson Lidderdale of Castlesmith, Dumfriesshire, and Ann, daughter of John Pearce of Standen Farm, Hungerford, Berkshire, who married at Dummer, Hampshire, in 1800. Married John Reeks of Standen Farm in 1835. Mother of Henry Reeks.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/714/36/4–5)
Hampshire, England, allegations for marriage licences, 1689–1837 (Ancestry.com, accessed 27 October 2022)
Salisbury and Winchester Journal, 9 February 1835, p. 4
